page.title: 17THE JACKSDALE SCOUTS
page.content: The Jacksdale scouts meet every Monday night at 8.00 pm. at the scout hut on Main Road in the village.The scouts is for boys aged 10 to 15. The first activity after arriving is the flag break. This is when we hoist the Union Jack and then 'break' it (unfurl it). When this has been done we usually have a game. On a dry night we all go outside and play 'wide game' which is like hide and seek. After this we go back into the hut and split up into groups with the scouters (adults who organise the scout troup) to work on badges. There are many badges which can be earned.They range from swimming and athletics to cooking and rope work. At 9.15 pm. we have a drink of orange. Then we say prayers and go home at 9.30 pm.
